sent.orig: Confidence is obeying, and obeys need confidence.
sent.trans: 信心就是顺服，而顺服需要信心。

sent.orig: Confidence limits are the upper and lower limits of the confidence interval.
sent.trans: 置信限是指置信区间的界限。

sent.orig: There is no innate confidence, but only the confidence fostered in continuous.
sent.trans: 没有天生的信心，只有不断培养的信心。

sent.orig: It takes confidence to pull it off with a straight face -- too much confidence.
sent.trans: 这需要很大的勇气来摆上一脸严肃的表情。

sent.orig: Confidence regions generalise the confidence interval concept to deal with multiple quantities.
sent.trans: 置信区域产生了置信区间这个概念以处理各种不同的数量。
